MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY1 postcode area of Thornton. Following a number of recent power cuts, It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:45am in order to install fault finding equipment at the Donald Crescent substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:25am on Thursday, 31 December 2020
